feed.title: Ryan Atkinson
feed.subtitle: blog of a web developer making open source community software

entry.title: A year of making open source web community software
entry.summary: I discuss my work on open source community software called Felt over the last year, giving a brief overview of the design and technology choices, and announcing our newsletter and podcast at FeltCoop.

entry.title: An ongoing attempt to credit my influences
entry.summary: I attempt to give credit to the people and projects that have influenced my work. This is an impossible task so it will be an evolving process.
